programme.title: 2025 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament
programme.desc: The No. 2 Huskies face the No. 1 Bruins in the NCAA Tournament's Final Four. Paige Bueckers had 31 points as UConn eliminated No. 1 USC and advanced to a record 24th Final Four. Lauren Betts has averaged 23 points per game through UCLA's tourney run.

programme.title: 2025 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament
programme.desc: Paige Bueckers looks to cap her college career with a title as the Huskies draw the Gamecocks in the NCAA Tournament final. UConn seeks a record 12th national championship. South Carolina plays for its fourth title since 2017 under Dawn Staley.
